mood: Tense negotiation giving way to uneasy compromise. Discovery of ansible's true nature is unsettling. Alien arrival imminent creates urgency. Hope that compromise can work. Uncertainty about whether aliens will accept human terms. Waiting for Lira creates long-term tension.
